definition: to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle

sentences.english: Drug addiction, drug selling and other illegal acts are also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁吸毒贩毒和其他违法行为。

sentences.english: It's nerve-wracking to watch the games that law enforcement and drug dealers play with each other.
sentences.chinese: 看执法部门和毒贩之间的猫鼠游戏让人心惊胆战。

sentences.english: But Nunez says drug smugglers are not always easy to catch.
sentences.chinese: 但弩内兹还表示，逮捕毒贩一直有其难度。

sentences.english: There have even been high-ranking government officials arrested for taking bribes from drug traffickers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有高级政府官员因涉嫌收受毒贩贿赂而被捕。

sentences.english: Drug dealers acquire drugs in Thailand and then mail them to Hong Kong drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 毒贩在泰国购买毒品，再寄给香港的吸毒者。

sentences.english: Mount intelligence-led operations against drug traffickers .
sentences.chinese: 以情报为主导的行动打击毒贩。

sentences.english: The body was identified as that of a drug dealer.
sentences.chinese: 那具尸体被辩出，原来是一名毒贩。

sentences.english: Truffle "hunters" try to avoid the taxman as much as drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 松露“猎手”躲避收税员就像毒贩一样。

sentences.english: The police have been given extra powers to entrap drug traffickers.
sentences.chinese: 警方已经被进一步授权诱捕毒贩。

sentences.english: Final Zhang Quanzhong hostage of one rescue of Shi Erdiao success peddles poison catch the whole lot in an action.
sentences.chinese: 最后张全忠一石二鸟成功解救人质并将毒贩一网打尽。

sentences.english: Discos in Shenzhen are well-known for selling drugs.
sentences.chinese: 毒贩通常会在深圳的士高贩卖毒品。

sentences.english: The local drug traffickers worked together on a heroin smuggling operation.
sentences.chinese: 当地的毒贩纠合起来走私海洛因。

sentences.english: Very quickly her drug lord boyfriend locked Guzman in a golden cage.
sentences.chinese: 很快，尤雅娜的毒贩男友将她锁进一个金丝鸟笼里。

sentences.english: A drug-funded army unit killed 10 police officers.
sentences.chinese: 一支由毒贩资助的部队杀死了10名警察。

sentences.english: It's said the drug pushers stand in with the police.
sentences.chinese: 听说毒贩都和警方相勾结。

sentences.english: Waging a battle against the drug pushers was a challenge to Armstead.
sentences.chinese: 对阿姆斯特德来说，向毒贩展开斗争是个挑战。

definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
